SignUpCredentials.signup_subtitle: Track orders and get access to the goodest tech.
SignUpCredentials.password_description: At least 8 characters, including 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter and 1 digit (0–9).

SignUpCredentials.privacy_policy_description: We need this info to create your account and manage your orders and trade-ins on our marketplace. Your info is processed by Back Market (JUNG SAS) to offer you our services, manage and track your orders and trade-ins, meet legal requirements, and fight and prevent fraud. You have the right to access, rectify, limit, delete your personal data and — where applicable — object to commercial prospecting. Find more info in our
